code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function App(){const[count,setCount]=useState(0);const increment=()=>setCount(count+1);const decrement=()=>setCount(count-1);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{textAlign:'center',marginTop:'50px'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Simple React Counter"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:count}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:increment,style:{marginRight:'10px'},children:"Increment"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:decrement,children:"Decrement"})]});}export default App;
